features: 🌱SUPER MOISTURE FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: Our hydrating dry skin lotion features a blend of botanicals that help nourish dry sensitive skin. Massage into rough, cracked skin like elbows, knees & hands.
🌱CALM SEVERE DRYNESS: Colloidal oatmeal lotion helps soothe extremely dry skin, and with organic cocoa butter aloe vera & chamomile, this dry skin cream delivers soft, smooth, deeply hydrated skin.
🌱SOOTHE YOUR SENSES: Lavender lotion from pure essential oil honors sensitive skin's needs for gentle care. Breathe deeply & enjoy the relaxing scent of this lavender body lotion for sensitive skin.
🌱NO NASTY INGREDIENTS: Our non-greasy moisturizer for dry skin contains essential ingredients sourced from nature. Your skin will love this deeply moisturizing lotion for extremely dry skin.
🌱LOVE IT OR IT'S ON US: Give your skin the gift of a moisturizing body lotion for dry skin women and men love. If your skin doesn't feel nourished, let us know & we'll give you a full refund.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DISCLAIMER: At Tree to Tub, we prioritize accurate product information, but note that updates may occur due to manufacturing changes in packaging and ingredients; rest assured, our products are always fresh and effective, even if occasionally shipped with different packaging.

Gentle For All For normal to even very sensitive types because all skin needs extra loving care. Skin Friendly pH Protect your skin with pH balanced formulas. Say goodbye to irritations! Natural Fragrance No artificial, overpowering smell. Just light, natural scents from essential oils. Clean Ingredients When we say clean, we mean it! Only the purest, straight Mother Nature.

View Product Step 5 - Hand Cream Non Greasy, Quick Absorb: This moisturizing non greasy hand lotion leaves tender soft skin without leaving oily residue. View Product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Lotion Ever
reviews.reviewText: The body lotion of my dreams. Reasonably priced. Clean ingredients. Great packaging. Absorbs quickly and moisturizes my skin. I enjoy the no scent, no skin irritation what so ever. I love this product and will continue to use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best lotion ever!
reviews.reviewText: I make my own body butters and salves, so I haven’t bought lotion in years, but with all the extra hand washing due to the Coronavirus I wanted something with a pump that I could place by the sink. When I started looking my requirements were: a pump bottle, no icky chemicals and no GMOs. This seemed to be the best match and when I emailed them to verify that their products were GMO free they got back to me in less than 24 hours. The smell is very nice — not too overpowering or artificial; it actually smells like essential oil and not artificial fragrance. It’s thinner than other lotions I’ve used in the past, but it moisturizes much better. When I use it, it rubs in completely with no greasy residue, but my skin feels softer and well moisturized and that feeling lasts longer than it usually does when I use lotion — I find that because lotion is made up of so much water, my skin usually feels dry 10 minutes after I’ve put it on. This lotion rubs in very easily and only requires a small amount to moisturize well, so while it is more expensive than some natural lotions, it lasts longer. If you’re looking for a truly natural lotion that makes your skin feel great this is a perfect choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable, pure, effective, and versatile
reviews.reviewText: My skin is in rough shape. I have very dry, eczema prone skin with patches that tend to break out with occasional acne, scar tissue formation, and rough calluses on elbows and feet. And I got so tired of using multiple skin care products that either barely helped or were way too expensive ($60 face creams, anyone?). So I researched different ingredients, tried out some raw shea butter and coconut oil to see how my skin would react to them, and put quite a few hours into searching for just the right product to meet my needs. This lotion isn't a miracle cream, but with its affordability, pure ingredients, effective moisturizing, and all-over versatility it's pretty close.I purchased the unscented version and it truly is without any scent, good or bad. It comes out thin like a lotion, which made me nervous at first, but goes on silky smooth like the thickest creams, yet without any sort of greasy residue. I've been using it all over (face and body) to the exclusion of any other moisturizing products, just to see what it could do - and I've gone from 6 containers on my countertop to just one, which is pretty amazing. No more dual face creams, body-only lotion, extra moisturizing treatment, cuticle cream, and callus cream! It's gentle enough for sensitive areas like around the eyes, yet effective enough for tough areas like elbows and feet. It hasn't completely reduced my calluses, but it's certainly stopped them from getting worse. My cuticles and skin tone have improved, my acne has almost disappeared, and red eczema-prone patches have evened out. I live in a cold, dry, wintry climate . . . so that's saying something! I love that it's made of the purest and most natural ingredients, and have enjoyed learning more about the benefits of soapberries. I will definitely be buying more of this in the future!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good moisturizer. Thick and not greasy
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a moisturizer that didn’t have the chemicals that “over the counter” lotions have. Not the cleanest lotion on the market but definitely a step or two up from “over the counter”. It’s thick and not greasy. When you first put it in it feels like it’s going to be greasy but it’s not. Leaves skin smooth and gets rid of dryness. Raw unscented is a perfect description for the scent, or lack there of which I wanted. My son is happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this lotion! I have sensitive skin and this lotion is great. It is moisturizing and makes my skin feel soft and well taken care of.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Lotion Ever!
reviews.reviewText: Oh my......I've only had this a few days, but this is probably the best lotion-face cream- hand cream product I've ever used! Not every lotion is gentle enough to use all over, but this one actually is. A huge help when traveling, and generally just reducing clutter, which I love! I'm a firm believer in natural, organic bath and body products. I have used quite a few different brands, including locally handcrafted products from the farmer's market, and I've crafted some of my own.So far this definitely ranks up there in the lotion department! I feel like it performs just as well as my Bare Minerals face cream product, which is amazing, but much pricier. I still love that brand, and will definitely continue using the makeup products, but I think I might switch over to this product for a moisturizer.My daughters are using it for acne and eczema with amazing results. Even overnight we can tell a difference. Feels great, and does not irritate the least bit.So far, it looks like we've found a winner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So I’ve been using for about a month and it’s just ok. I definitely felt that my Vaseline lotion is more moisturizing by far but I wanted something with cleaner ingredients…so for me this was ok. It does moisturize but I have to re-moisturize quicker which means I’m using more product which seems to be my issue with this overall line. The stuff is good and Works but you have to use so much to get there and then the cost isn’t making sense. However I can’t knock the product but I do wish this was more creamy and moisturizing for us. The scent is nice tho
It is a little bit pricey, but excellent quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells gorgeous and makes my skin feel so silky!
muy satisfecho con esta crema para la psoriasis leve en los codos y la cabeza. mejora la piel y la irritación, de forma rápida y eficaz. Yo recomiendo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was lovely to have it put on. I had such dry itchy skin used it for 2weeks by then my body felt so soft and all itching had cleared up but continued using it.I have recommended to all my friends.
